headline: Alexandria Real Estate (ARE) Hits Fresh 52-Week Low on Disappointing Q3
summary: We recently published 10 Stocks Crashing Hard Despite Highly Optimistic Market. Alexandria Real Estate Equities, Inc. (NYSE:ARE) is one of the worst-performing stocks on Tuesday. Alexandria Real Estate fell to a new 52-week low on Tuesday, as investor sentiment was dampened by a disappointing earnings performance in the third quarter of the year. During the […]

headline: Alexandria Real Estate Equities (ARE): Projected Earnings Rebound Tests Bullish Turnaround Narrative
summary: Alexandria Real Estate Equities (ARE) remains unprofitable, with losses that have grown at a rate of 39.5% per year over the past five years. While revenue is forecast to inch forward at just 0.6% annually, much slower than the broader US market’s expected 10.2% growth, analysts see a sharp turnaround. They forecast earnings to rise by 113.54% per year and the company reaching profitability within the next three years. With shares trading at $62.94, notably below the estimated fair value of...
